content:
I have been trying to publish the Da Vinci PDex IG. It was working until 8/14. Since then I get an error in the build on build.fhir.org but the IG compiles locally. I am using sushi + fhir publisher. Locally I have updated Sushi to 0.15 to match the server configuration and tried publisher 1.1.13 and 1.1.14.
Build log is here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-epdx/branches/master/failure/build.log
Error appears to be: Publishing Content Failed: Error: folder /scratch/ig-build-temp-YF6GV0/repo/source/resources not found (00:00.0056)
Can anyone suggest how to fix this?
well, your source material is in input/resources, but your configuration says it's in source/resources
thanks - I will take a look at that.
